cms:release.cms:author: Probe Team
cms:release.cms:precaution: for eoCapture (FBC) usage FBC platform patch 0012 is needed
ECR 2178 is turned off by default, see Release Notes for configuration

cms:platform-dependency.cms:description: Base OS services (for full functionality including x-commands the ssh server must be installed and running as well)
